attributes.action: Make Nigel Farage Resign as a Member of European Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
[1] “Virtually none of you have ever done a proper job in your lives.” and “And the reason you’re so upset, the reason you’re so angry, has been perfectly clear from all the angry exchanges this morning. You, as a political project, are in denial. You are in denial that your currency is failing,” - Nigel Farage
[1] - https://www.theguardian.com/world/2016/jun/28/meps-boo-nigel-farage-insults-in-european-parliament
attributes.background: After Nigel Farage's disgraceful and disrespectful comments in the European Parliament on the 28/06/2016, Nigel Farage should publicly apologise to the members of European Parliament and UK citizens before his official resignation.
